# Function getInstance

  * getInstance(): Telemetry

Gets the current telemetry instance

#### Returns Telemetry

The telemetry instance or undefined if not initialized

#### Description

Returns the singleton telemetry instance if initialized

#### Example


```
const telemetry = getInstance();if (telemetry) &#123;  // Telemetry is initialized and available&#125;

```
